entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
